dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Did you find 'em? Tell me you found my drug- I mean, my sprat carriers. Would hate should anything dire have befallen them.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You want the good news or the bad news?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found your sprat carriers. But someone stole the delivery. <Keep Drug Consumables>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll get back to you on that.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Just tell me straight and don't hold back. I can handle it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Retrieved your drugs. But raptidons killed your carriers in the cave.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sprats can always be replaced. Excellent, this is perf- THIS IS ONLY HALF! Are you - you think you can steal from me?!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I searched the cave top to bottom. That's all there was.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Punch him in the eye.> Get ahold of yourself.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Search Fallbrook. Either half the sprats got loose on their own, or there'll be some evidence pointing to the soon-to-be-dead snake who filched my carriers.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: You want your cut? You get me the rest of my drugs. No matter what it takes.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Ow!!! Damn it, that hurts like the blazes! Okay, okay. All right. You didn't take it... but someone did.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Seeing as that statement is "wink" free... I'm madder than a mantiswarm. And ready to bite somebody.
